title.narrative: Strengthening the Analytical Capacities of the UNCT to Promote the Quality Contribution of Migrants and Refugees in the Uruguayan Labor Market and in Society

description.narrative: This project aims to contribute to improve labour integration for migrants and refugees in Uruguay, considering particularly skilled workforce and idle. Within this framework, the Office of the United Nations Resident Coordinator in Uruguay (OCR) proposes to adapt diagnostic methodologies and generate knowledge to promote the quality contribution of migrants and refugees to the labour market and Uruguayan society, by defining mechanisms to ensure that the migrant and refugee population, with specific qualifications, can integrate into public and private sector employment. To achieve this, it is proposed to carry out research that will favour the creation of knowledge about the contribution of qualified migrants to the labour market and to Uruguayan society, as well as the current gaps in the dynamics of insertion. Likewise, specific mechanisms will be defined to match the invisible labour offer with the demand required in the current production processes at a national level. In this way, it seeks to influence the mechanisms for obtaining employment for the migrant population in Uruguay, in spaces required by the public and private sectors.
